title: @Riot Blood Lord Vladimir needs an update/fix for a 1820 RP skin!
body:
Blood Lord skin really doesn't live up to that price. I love this skin, it was one of the best skins in game before you "updated" it with his rework.
When you get into the game, you really don't feel the "blood lord" vibe in anything other than his voice. His splash art is also amazing, but in game it just doesn't live up to it.
https://imgur.com/jb2RKjF

Also, look at this animations. That old big one was the reason I bought the skin. When you Q-ed someone, you really felt like you're taking their blood. New animation is terrible and you literally can't even see it in game if you don't really focus on it.
https://imgur.com/l3YQVPq
https://imgur.com/w7WAv8o

replies.body:
In the meantime, I'd like a Vlad skin where he's wearing cargo shirts and a T-shirt that says "Hemomancer against Cancer."

Then everyone will know Vladimir is just a really nice guy who is entirely misunderstood.
Rito should do this and donate the profit to organizations that fight cancer
There's quite a few 1820 skins that need updating.
Magnificent TF costs 1820 but it's more like 750/975 for the effort they put in.
don't forget gentleman cho. Only VO is there. There are no particle effect changes.
it was also the first of their kind. Like his skin was first of its kind.
bruh pls. 3 comments?
probably a bug with wifi connection or something. Not his fault. People accidentally post duplicate comments all the time on reddit.
it was also the first of its kind.
it was also the first of its kind.
The unique thing about this one is that they think it got **_worse_** with the Vlad update.  The old Q animation is preferred.
Ok gotcha.

> [{quoted}](name=Friendly Ram,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E99GfZK5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-21T22:35:34.905+0000)
>
> There's quite a few 1820 skins that need updating.

i'm still upset about {{champion:4}} {{champion:18}} and {{champion:74}} 1820 skins not getting bumped up to legendary quality when they got their respective VU's.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Fangz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E99GfZK5,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-22T03:47:54.727+0000)
>
> i'm still upset about {{champion:4}} {{champion:18}} and {{champion:74}} 1820 skins not getting bumped up to legendary quality when they got their respective VU's.

Yeah but those skins were already "retired".

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Champion_skin#Retired

Also keep in mind with VGUs past retired skins DID get updated. But not the legedary ones -for example Twitch's retired skins.
It won't happen until he gets a vgu

Which won't happen soon, despite the fact that the fanbases of JoJo, Castlevania, Hellsing, Anne Rice, every Stoker franchise ever, Legacy of Kain, GoT, Dragon Age, serial killer media (looking at Patrick Bateman and the likes here) are out there and waiting to be catered to.

Don't mind me, just a sad fan.
I would spend at least 3000 for a skin voiced by Crispin Freeman or Curtis Arnott.

Plot twist.
Crispin Freeman voices the entire Vlad VU.

{{sticker:sg-jinx}} 

http://www.auplod.com/u/dpoula9d885.png
Well, I guess I'm having another wank today.
*faints*
Funny that you mention Dragon Age, that game is what made Blood Magic stand out to me so much. Shame they didn't have it in Inquisition.

_"His splash art is also amazing."_

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9PeJby-lNLM/maxresdefault.jpg

Correction. The angle is great. The quality is outdated.
Just compare it to the updated splash arts of Marquis and Count Vladimir.

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/fb748ef274b9971f998da5f74a0661515130037cd31f79d6bba7882a277c0060.jpg

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/81a719304ea264d5104428fe034e07e40096c3ce8577442a9a75b542ad35a0c1.jpg

See what i mean?
The art quality has greatly improved since Blood Lord Vlad's release. So, i imagine, the splash art will be updated alongside the entire skin when Vlad gets his Visual Update.

http://www.auplod.com/u/dpoula9d885.png

There's fanart better than the current splash.

https://img00.deviantart.net/4ab2/i/2015/291/c/7/lol_fan_art___vlad_vs_darius__hemoplague_by_berylcirclet-d9dimy3.jpg
Update my handsome man. Seriously, Vlad needs some love in the visual update department.
I totally agree. Hopefully they'll do something about it.
Yes, please!

The new animation is definately better than the old one lmao.

That said, the skin should be updated but so should a lot of other skins
Vlad Agrees.

Meanwhile, The Magnificent Twisted Fate and Annie in Wonderland...

Blood Lord Vladimir is at least the 12th legendary skin ever released, so they started to get their act together with it.
Corporate mundo
At least that one has a VO....
Lool what about Red baron and Ice Toboggan corki? Vlad has it good compared to those skins.
Or the skin "The Magnificent Twisted Fate", so ugly, so expensive.
That one's a ripoff too
Would be nice if they added recall animation all of the legendary skins have one but this one.
zombie brand needs one too

Well if we are on this topic, throw in Annie in Wonderland as well.

Seriously though Riot already stated that old 1820rp skins will never be updated to meet current 1820 standards. I believe it was KateyKhaos that stated that.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie Lolicon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E99GfZK5,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2017-10-22T16:43:26.477+0000)
>
> Well if we are on this topic, throw in Annie in Wonderland as well.
> 
> Seriously though Riot already stated that old 1820rp skins will never be updated to meet current 1820 standards. I believe it was KateyKhaos that stated that.

Source?
At least change the face so I don't have to look at this all game https://i.imgur.com/qt27pM3.png
{{champion:8}} {{item:3070}}
The 2 y\o rant is back at it again. #NeverGiveUp Or maybe it's just different people saying it. Haven't been playing attention
Or Demonblade Tryndamere as well.

so is this gonna happen every week now?

There's plenty of those {{champion:18}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:42}} all got "legendary skins" that are worth 975 or in cho's case at best 1350 (new voice).
{{champion:23}} {{champion:31}}
Then what about Demonblade {{champion:23}} ?
Marquis is better.
I really would love them to do that ...
Tough noogies.
While we're on the topic of reworking, they never should have reworked him to begin with..I can't stand playing him anymore.
